Class Person

java.lang.Object
  jmud.entity.Entity
      jmud.entity.Person
Direct Known Subclasses:
Character
public class Person
extends Entity

Represents a person entity. Can be extended to provide functionality for characters and NPCs

Author:
Will Pall

Constructor Detail

Person

public Person(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String description,
              Room currentRoom)
Initializes a new person with the given attributes and associates that person with the given room.

Parameters:
name - The person's name
description - The person's description
currentRoom - The room where the person is currently located
Method Detail

moveToRoom

public void moveToRoom(Room destination)
Moves the person to a new room and notifies the characters that the person has left/entered the room.

Parameters:
destination - The room to move the person to
